resources.string: Use the Agenda View to view all your events. Click on an event to view the details of that event. Long click on an event to delete that event, or to delete multiple events. Add an event by clicking the New Event icon in the action bar.

Use the Weekly View to view all your events for the current week. Clicking on a particular day will bring up the New Event screen with the date auto filled to the day clicked. Like in the Agenda View, add an event by clicking the New Event icon in the action bar.

Use the New Event screen to add an event. Events must have a title, date, start time, and end time. Add an attendee to an event by clicking the Add Person icon in the action bar, which will allow you to select a person from your contacts. Only contacts with email addresses can be added. Save the event by clicking the Save Event icon in the action bar.
Use the View Event screen to view the details of an event. Delete the event by clicking the Delete Event icon in the action bar. Edit the event by clicking the Edit Event icon in the action bar.
Use the Edit Event screen to edit an event. Add an attendee to an event by clicking the Add Person icon in the action bar. Save the event by clicking the Save Event icon in the action bar.
